features.situation: from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else
from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else

2d40bcc3-0557-4065-af7b-b16176daaf17.name: Off-the-Shelf Looks
2d40bcc3-0557-4065-af7b-b16176daaf17.notes: Halves the usual reaction bonus - adjust manually

features.situation: from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else. Exception: Members of the same sex with reason to dislike you (more than -4 in reaction penalties regardless of bonuses) resent your good looks and react at -2 instead.

from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else. Exception: Members of the same sex with reason to dislike you (more than -4 in reaction penalties regardless of bonuses) resent your good looks and react at -2 instead.

from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else. Exception: Members of the same sex with reason to dislike you (more than -4 in reaction penalties regardless of bonuses) resent your good looks and react at -2 instead.
to skill rolls any time you take an unnecessary risk (in the GM’s opinion)

031e3843-d3bb-4466-ac69-673506f9228f.name: Fit
031e3843-d3bb-4466-ac69-673506f9228f.notes: Recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

features.situation: to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, or resist poison
in penalties may be ignored when due to close quarters
in penalties may be ignored when due to close quarters

dccd3312-7bef-4dce-bbb0-50c5779a8d5c.name: High Pain Threshold
dccd3312-7bef-4dce-bbb0-50c5779a8d5c.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured

features.situation: on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning
to your effective HT whenever you roll to recover lost HP or to see if you can get over a crippling injury

4aeac462-5a76-4f16-bd69-f746d56adc08.name: People Affected
4aeac462-5a76-4f16-bd69-f746d56adc08.notes: Almost everyone except @large class of people@

2b7ba3b1-345c-4935-952e-78a55e93a09a.name: Very Fit
2b7ba3b1-345c-4935-952e-78a55e93a09a.notes: Recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

features.situation: to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison

7b129e3f-dc4f-41ad-a0c8-86270ef99a55.name: Very Rapid Healing
7b129e3f-dc4f-41ad-a0c8-86270ef99a55.notes: When you roll to recover lost HP, a successful HT roll means you heal 2 HP, not 1

features.situation: to effective HT when rolling to recover lost HP or to see if you can get over a crippling injury

40829b97-9abf-4379-b80a-478c418811ed.name: Acrophobia (Heights)
40829b97-9abf-4379-b80a-478c418811ed.notes: You may not voluntarily go more than 15 feet above ground, unless you are inside a building and away from windows. If there is some chance of an actual fall, self-control rolls are at -5.

12e55398-c4a6-49dd-972d-0b1b62d8bf34.name: Agoraphobia (Open Spaces)
12e55398-c4a6-49dd-972d-0b1b62d8bf34.notes: You are uncomfortable whenever you are outside, and actually become frightened when there are no walls within 50 feet.

8d401548-e96a-469c-85c6-73b1af561e2d.name: Aichmophobia/TL5- (Sharp Things)
8d401548-e96a-469c-85c6-73b1af561e2d.notes: You are afraid of anything pointed. Swords, spears, knives, and needles all give you fits. Trying to use a sharp weapon, or being threatened with one, requires a self-control roll at -2.

60bc01ee-fd8d-45a6-9392-a0a0ceca139f.name: Aichmophobia/TL6+ (Sharp Things)
60bc01ee-fd8d-45a6-9392-a0a0ceca139f.notes: You are afraid of anything pointed. Swords, spears, knives, and needles all give you fits. Trying to use a sharp weapon, or being threatened with one, requires a self-control roll at -2.

d351dd3a-2496-4c91-bb25-9fd1f0e5cc43.name: Ailurophobia (Cats)
d351dd3a-2496-4c91-bb25-9fd1f0e5cc43.notes: This includes all felines: lions, tigers, panthers, etc.

e22bbd05-d9e3-4fe9-8faf-3ae37e6f708a.name: Autophobia (Being Alone)
e22bbd05-d9e3-4fe9-8faf-3ae37e6f708a.notes: You cannot stand to be alone, and do anything in your power to avoid it.

506ef891-1123-418b-bf13-11d5b25c6df6.name: Bad Back
506ef891-1123-418b-bf13-11d5b25c6df6.notes: Throw out your back whenever you make a ST roll, and whenever you roll 17 or 18 on an attack or defense roll in melee combat, or on a roll for an “athletic” skill such as Acrobatics, make a HT roll as well

73879217-28d3-4d68-8be0-5c4b3a969552.name: Brontophobia (Loud Noises)
73879217-28d3-4d68-8be0-5c4b3a969552.notes: You avoid any situation where loud noises are likely. A sudden loud noise requires an immediate self-control roll. A thunderstorm is a traumatic experience for you!

cafdc32c-1922-45aa-9557-a766717f67db.name: Claustrophobia (Enclosed Spaces)
cafdc32c-1922-45aa-9557-a766717f67db.notes: You are uncomfortable any time you can’t see the sky – or at least a very high ceiling. In a small room or vehicle, you feel the walls closing in on you... You need air! This is a dangerous fear for someone who plans to go underground.

99797436-0905-4751-8697-4d91a8743b56.name: Code of Honor (Professional)
99797436-0905-4751-8697-4d91a8743b56.notes: Adhere to the ethics of your profession; always do your job to the best of your ability; support your guild, union, or professional association.

aabc562d-7188-4f1c-8d7b-d27f003806aa.name: Coitophobia (Sex)
aabc562d-7188-4f1c-8d7b-d27f003806aa.notes: You are terrified by the idea of sexual relations or the loss of your virginity.

features.situation: or worse from sober-minded citizens (GM discretion)

b73eb51c-9acf-4694-aa8d-76a8f857fd16.name: Cynophobia (Dogs)
b73eb51c-9acf-4694-aa8d-76a8f857fd16.notes: This includes all canines: foxes, wolves, coyotes, wild dogs, etc.

e6c66f7c-6325-4b97-bfaa-9e05536d58ee.name: Demophobia (Crowds)
e6c66f7c-6325-4b97-bfaa-9e05536d58ee.notes: Any group of over a dozen people sets off this fear unless they are all well known to you. The self-control roll is at -1 for over 25 people, -2 for a crowd of 100 or more, -3 for 1,000, -4 for 10,000, and so on.

75985885-771d-4bf4-bc69-230fc1303cb6.name: Entomophobia (Insects)
75985885-771d-4bf4-bc69-230fc1303cb6.notes: You are afraid of all “bugs.” Large or poisonous ones give -3 to self-control rolls. Very large ones, or large numbers, give -6. Avoid hills of giant ants.

43d684cd-0a27-4857-ab72-7644aef97957.name: Greed
43d684cd-0a27-4857-ab72-7644aef97957.notes: Make a self-control roll any time riches are offered – as payment for fair work, gains from adventure, spoils of crime, or just bait. If you fail, you do whatever it takes to get the payoff.

d7a4c586-b41f-4248-9392-4c97e999b013.name: Hemophobia (Blood)
d7a4c586-b41f-4248-9392-4c97e999b013.notes: The sight of blood gives you the screaming willies! You need to make a self-control roll during most combats...

74eedb4d-7516-4638-bedb-f6d2b7267840.name: Herpetophobia (Reptiles)
74eedb4d-7516-4638-bedb-f6d2b7267840.notes: You come unglued at the thought of reptiles, amphibians, and similar scaly slimies. A very large reptile, or a poisonous one, gives -2 to self-control rolls; a horde of reptiles (such as a snake pit) gives -4.

4245a6bd-5c91-47a1-8faa-24d3b7937063.name: Honesty
4245a6bd-5c91-47a1-8faa-24d3b7937063.notes: Make a self-control roll when faced with the “need” to break unreasonable laws; if you fail, you must obey the law, whatever the consequences. If you manage to resist your urges and break the law, make a second self-control roll afterward. If you fail, you must turn yourself in to the authorities!

307cf6f7-db37-436b-bbab-441c97626cea.name: Hoplophobia (Weapons)
307cf6f7-db37-436b-bbab-441c97626cea.notes: The presence of any sort of weaponry is stressful. Trying to use a weapon, or being threatened with one, requires a self-control roll at -2.

6614366f-726d-4377-9c5c-c8f30b02719e.name: Impulsiveness
6614366f-726d-4377-9c5c-c8f30b02719e.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever it would be wise to wait and ponder. If you fail, you must act

67b641ed-7465-4fd4-941c-9f7a10e2b4db.name: Incurious
67b641ed-7465-4fd4-941c-9f7a10e2b4db.notes: Make a self-control roll when confronted with something strange. If you fail, you ignore it!

features.situation: from victims of your intolerance (may be as much as -5, at GM's discretion)
toward those you are jealous of (may be as much as -4, at GM's discretion)

6ad6dcfb-0232-4ffc-8b10-46f5a4dd3972.name: Lecherousness
6ad6dcfb-0232-4ffc-8b10-46f5a4dd3972.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you have more than the briefest contact with an appealing member of the sex you find attractive, at -5 if this person is Handsome/Beautiful, or at -10 if Very Handsome/Very Beautiful. If you fail, you must make a “pass” using whatever wiles and skills you can bring to bear.

dd2f8f67-279c-4153-810d-59ef3bf6e365.name: Manaphobia (Magic)
dd2f8f67-279c-4153-810d-59ef3bf6e365.notes: You can never learn to use magic, and you react badly to any user of magic. Make a self-control roll whenever you are in the presence of magic. This roll is at -3 if you are to be the target of friendly magic, and -6 if you are the target of hostile magic. (The magic does not have to be real, if you believe in it!)

0b45e750-1db8-4be5-b2a8-145c54383b34.name: Mild Shyness
0b45e750-1db8-4be5-b2a8-145c54383b34.notes: You are uneasy with strangers, especially assertive or attractive ones.

d909d339-8ed3-4398-988e-a98d7a3935b1.name: Mysophobia (Dirt)
d909d339-8ed3-4398-988e-a98d7a3935b1.notes: You are deathly afraid of infection, or just of dirt and filth. Make a self-control roll when you must do something that might get you dirty. Roll at -5 to eat any unaccustomed food. You should act as “finicky” as possible.

52bd8c4a-9e7c-41be-ae78-0aad8a5092f2.name: Necrophobia (Death)
52bd8c4a-9e7c-41be-ae78-0aad8a5092f2.notes: You are terrified by the idea of death. Make a self-control roll in the presence of any dead body (animals don’t count, but portions of human bodies do). Roll at -4 if the body is that of someone you know, or -6 if the body is unnaturally animated in some way. A ghost (or apparent ghost) also requires a roll at -6.

3129257a-5f4f-4974-b833-34d91825090d.name: Obsession
3129257a-5f4f-4974-b833-34d91825090d.notes: varies; Make a self-control roll whenever it would be wise to deviate from your goal. If you fail, you continue to pursue your Obsession, regardless of the consequences.

6239dbfe-a066-4468-8c97-ac8af9739c7a.name: Overconfidence
6239dbfe-a066-4468-8c97-ac8af9739c7a.notes: You must make a self-control roll any time the GM feels you show an unreasonable degree of caution. If you fail, you must go ahead as though you were able to handle the situation!

features.situation: from young or naive individuals who believe you are as good as you say you are

0bb34ac8-c860-4d14-aa11-a5eb712de6a4.name: Pyrophobia (Fire)
0bb34ac8-c860-4d14-aa11-a5eb712de6a4.notes: Even a burning cigarette bothers you if it comes within five yards.

c17f4f91-eaa4-4490-95be-32853b8f3ded.name: People Affected
c17f4f91-eaa4-4490-95be-32853b8f3ded.notes: Almost everyone except @large class of people@

151d0b9a-3c99-4143-83e2-cf851b5dca46.name: Scotophobia (Darkness)
151d0b9a-3c99-4143-83e2-cf851b5dca46.notes: A common fear, but crippling. You should avoid being underground if possible; if something happens to your flashlight or torch, you might well lose your mind before you can relight it.

bf77a740-f2d6-433c-b87d-63a61b9fa0aa.name: Selfish
bf77a740-f2d6-433c-b87d-63a61b9fa0aa.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you experience a clear social slight or “snub.” On a failure, you lash out at the offending party just as if you had Bad Temper.

features.situation: from others when your Selfishness surfaces

aceb6c7f-14c6-48ca-b7a3-d2dfb8bfed99.name: Severe Shyness
aceb6c7f-14c6-48ca-b7a3-d2dfb8bfed99.notes: You are very uncomfortable around strangers, and tend to be quiet even among friends.

e39e6eed-7ab6-4733-a298-11a19ccff5a8.name: Teratophobia (Monsters)
e39e6eed-7ab6-4733-a298-11a19ccff5a8.notes: Any “unnatural” creature sets off this fear. You have -1 to -4 on the self-control roll if the monster seems very large or dangerous, or if there are a lot of them. Note that the definition of “monster” depends on experience. An American Indian would consider an elephant monstrous, while an African pygmy would not!

24603094-1fdc-4647-87fc-e7f8b3e9d988.name: Thalassophobia (Oceans)
24603094-1fdc-4647-87fc-e7f8b3e9d988.notes: You are afraid of any large body of water. Ocean travel, or even air travel over the ocean, is basically impossible for you, and encounters with aquatic monsters are also upsetting.

8e4968d5-9b7e-4127-8d44-185d1dc50d99.name: Triskaidekaphobia (Number 13)
8e4968d5-9b7e-4127-8d44-185d1dc50d99.notes: You must make a self-control roll whenever you have to deal with the number 13. Roll at -5 if Friday the 13th is involved!

c02f2a1f-3bd3-4487-a41e-2e775a98396d.name: Unluckiness
c02f2a1f-3bd3-4487-a41e-2e775a98396d.notes: Once per play session, the GM will arbitrarily and maliciously make something go wrong for you.

4f4f576a-670b-4442-86f5-81f86c0af2bf.name: Xenophobia (Strange and Unknown Things)
4f4f576a-670b-4442-86f5-81f86c0af2bf.notes: You are upset by any sort of strange circumstances, and in particular by strange people. Make a self-control roll when surrounded by people of another race or nationality; roll at -3 if the people are not human. If you lose control, you might well attack strangers out of fear.

05aa1b74-8165-4034-a84c-5c3105194ed8.name: Judo Sport
05aa1b74-8165-4034-a84c-5c3105194ed8.notes: Allows parrying two different attacks per turn, one with each hand.

15cb0cad-94c9-4a49-ad6c-7115fb75c631.name: Judo Sport
15cb0cad-94c9-4a49-ad6c-7115fb75c631.notes: Allows parrying two different attacks per turn, one with each hand.
